CIPHER.0.cipherString: When you're taught to love everyone, to love your enemies, then what value does that place on love?
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: I live in New York City, so there's so much stimulation when you walk outside, it does not require a television in the home.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,12).

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Culture is something that we all share, and we are all the poorer for anyone excluded from it.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,3).

CIPHER.3.cipherString: I like going there for golf. America's one vast golf course these days.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,5).

CIPHER.4.cipherString: I love acting. I take it day by day. I would really love to produce my own stuff and other stuff.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,13).

CIPHER.5.cipherString: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
CIPHER.5.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,12).

CIPHER.6.cipherString: This experience has also humbled me by giving me a true understanding of what millions of others face each day in their own fight against cancer.
CIPHER.6.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(19,10).

CIPHER.7.cipherString: The really unhappy person is the one who leaves undone what they can do, and starts doing what they don't understand; no wonder they come to grief.
CIPHER.7.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(19,8).

CIPHER.8.cipherString: I'm not constrained by being a genre writer. Any story I can imagine, I can cast as a fantasy novel and probably get it published.
CIPHER.8.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,14).

CIPHER.9.cipherString: One thing I'd like to do is angel investing in small companies. That's what's exciting, and if you are lucky to have a bit of money, you can take those risks.
CIPHER.9.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(17,15).

CIPHER.10.cipherString: I'd just turned 50, weighed 285, and my doctor had read me the riot act about my health.
CIPHER.10.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(3,11).

CIPHER.11.cipherString: After I made my hit in 'Salome,' Universal sent me to New York so I could learn to be a proper movie star.
CIPHER.11.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(3,23).

CIPHER.12.cipherString: I was one of the many horses pulling the wagon and couldn't escape left or right because of the will of the driver.
CIPHER.12.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,10).

CIPHER.13.cipherString: Mama exhorted her children at every opportunity to 'jump at the sun.' We might not land on the sun, but at least we would get off the ground.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: A lot of people watch 'Community,' but DVR viewings only count if you watch within a certain time.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: The biggest problem for me was feeling that as I became more balanced and a better man that I wouldn't have the fire to create from.
